headline: Beyond AI: Inside the Global Quantum Computer Race
summary: Einstein doubted it. But nearly a century later, quantum mechanics is driving one of the biggest technology races of our time. From drug discovery to finance and cybersecurity, the quantum revolution may redefine how we compute, invest, and live, and it could even outperform AI. IBM's Jamie Garcia and Jerry Chow explain why 2029 is the year to watch for quantum, while IonQ's Niccolo de Masi says his company is already years ahead.
